THIS OCTOBER 26TH, 2013 IN WASHINGTON, D.C AND AROUND THE COUNTRY

A RALLY AGAINST MASS SURVEILLANCE

WHO WE ARE

StopWatching.us is a coalition of other 100 public advocacy organizations and companies from across the political spectrum standing together against mass surveillance.

ANOUNCING THE RALLY AGAINST MASS SURVEILLACE

17 Sep 2013

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Morbi mattis hendrerit nulla eu placerat. Vestibulum hendrerit nisl libero, at sollicitudin nisi tincidunt vitae. WAYS TO TAKE PART

  • In person in Washington, D.C
  • At a viewing party in cities around the world.
  • Watch Online

WHAT TO EXPECT:

  • The single largest rally yet in opposition to surveillance.
  • Speeches from memebers of Congress and privacy experts.
  • Live Music.
